reviewText: This copy is really good and in English all you have to do is adjust the audio and for the price it is awesome. Did not know the story very well when I bought it , but I'm glad I did.
It has all the episodes,  but it is not an official release item.

This copy auto starts in Japanese with english subtitles. All you have to do is use the audio button on the remote or go to the main menu and change the audio settings. I had no problem with this set minus it takes a min to start and the picture gets distorted at some parts for a secound but fixes it's self fast. Over all verry happy with this purchase and I could not beet the price :)
Just an fyi this is subtitled and not English dubbed. Still great to watch as long as you don't mind subtitles :)
